### ðŸš¨ Emergency Protocol

**For CRITICAL issues only**:

1. Skip normal review process if immediate deployment required
2. Notify all stakeholders via emergency channels
3. Deploy with full monitoring enabled
4. Rollback immediately if new issues detected
5. Conduct post-mortem within 24 hours
